pkgmetadata.longdescription: # dstoolsCreate functions that help analyze models## Instructions1. Install:```pip install zsdstools```2. Create a single entropy report based on the probability output and target label```python import zsdstools as dstools import numpy as np import pandas as pd fruit = pd.read_csv("example_output.csv") fruit.head()```OUTPUT:|index|Target|0|1|2|3||---|---|---|---|---|---||0|APPLE|0\.5273084267289626|0\.0195542707477479|0\.0454055656042067|0\.0175861744248108||1|PEACH|0\.2444587226483518|0\.0016792361070194|0\.0104199440585952|0\.0101216447789426||2|MANGO|0\.2155941628311836|0\.0006081438828171|0\.002996750016832|0\.0071956575606295||3|APPLE|0\.4799842964085848|0\.0109675233663038|0\.0301269486808463|0\.011261835324509||4|BANABA|0\.0863417588391719|0\.0026766653871819|0\.0045768311542038|0\.0082518479425768|``` pythonfruit_report = dstools.create_single_df_entropy_report(prob = fruit.iloc[:, 1:] , target_label = fruit.iloc[:, 0], 'fruit')```OUTPUT:|index|Target|entropy|dataset||---|---|---|---||0|APPLE|0\.6258577956631657|fruit||1|PEACH|0\.449146984292262|fruit||2|MANGO|0\.388219058634102|fruit||3|APPLE|0\.5578428515548817|fruit||4|BANABA|0\.2915844811919383|fruit|3. Combine multiple entropy reports into one report```python # create fruit report fruit_report = dstools.create_single_df_entropy_report(prob = fruit.iloc[:, 1:] , target_label = fruit.iloc[:, 0], 'fruit') # create vegetable report vegetable_report = dstools.create_single_df_entropy_report(prob = vegetable.iloc[:, 1:] , target_label = vegetable.iloc[:, 0], 'vegetable') # combine them together entropy_report = dstools.combine_entropy_reports([fruit_report, vegetable])```4. Generate Plot```python dstools.entropy_plot(entropy_report)```![image.png](data:image/png;base64,) Generate Statistical Plots on your entropy report Arguments: entropy_report (DataFrame Array): Takes a single dataframe as entropy report type_report (String): summary : Plot entropy on all target labels summary, facetgrid : Plot entropy on facet of every kinds of target label type_report (String): histogram : Histogram plot boxplot: Boxplot violinplot: Violinplot Returns: dataframe: Entropy report all inputs Example: >>> dstools.entropy_plot(entropy_report, type_report = 'facetgrid', type_plot = 'violinplot')
